comment: You won't have a single regret taking this class. He is so easy going with deadlines and assignments it is almost impossible to not get an A unless you truly slack and don't submit a thing. I did not have an ounce of stress in this class. He is the absolute best.
Don't really need to say a lot, just take this class!

I LOVE THIS PROFESSOR! He is amazing, and really down to earth. The work is super easy, journal prompts and a final essay. He is very lenient on due dates, and will always try to work with you. I had him Monday and Wednesday, and attendance was only required on Wednesdays.
rating_tags: Inspirational--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: TAKE HIM!!! he is such an amazing teacher; he is super caring and with work with you. He is more focused on what you take from this class. we have journal entries and 2 papers. this isn't bad considering its a 15-week class. He is willing to work with you on deadlines. is open, sends out weekly emails to go over what might've been missed in class.
Get this man a reward!! Seriously!!

bruh take the class. I love this man so much tbh he is one of the kindest professors/teachers i've ever had! Super understanding and will work through any problems. He holds conferences alot, so attendance isnt a huge thing but when he holds class, go! just go! 2 essays and journal entries, thats it. Take the class, PROFESSOR IF U SEE THIS ILY!

He is such a sweetheart, a great professor to have your first year. He encourages participation, not required. You have 2-3 papers the entire year and he is very lenient about working with you if you miss any deadlines or anything, super lenient and easy-going to have. 100% would take again, 10/10 would recommend.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Great professor! Very caring and wish students to success. Only 3 papers throughout the semester and a discussion post per week. Giving soft deadlines for essays. Easy A. Even though attendance is mandatory, he gives 3 absences for no reason required per semester. However, he talks a lot which makes the lecture boring.

Take him!! I was able to take his class online over the summer and it was easy! He is very understanding and caring. He gives clear instructions. The way he sets up his class is for you to pass. He has soft/ suggestive deadlines so he is very flexible about everything. Would recommend him x100!
TAKE HIM JUST TAKE HIM. Especially if you are taking him for summer semester. I was working an internship but I was able to balance out the work with the internship. 10/10 would take again!
rating_tags: Amazing lectures --Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: I usually struggle with ENGL classes, but this one was a breeze. I took it over the summer, and it hardly felt like I was taking a class at all. We had four reflections, with the option to skip one. The topics were really engaging, making the course enjoyable. Hands down, the best professor I've had!

BEST PROFESSOR EVER. He is very caring guy that he make sure that his class is stress free and comfortable.TAKE THIS PROFESSOR!!! because his work is light work, easy grader, and help you to succeed or pass his class. I rate him 1000+/5 for being the best prof ever.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Caring--Graded by few things

comment: Absolute GOAT!

Prof. Martin is incredible. You can tell writing is something he loves and it shows in his teaching. He also a really nice Professor. I didn't get to get the full experience in his class but take it from the other reviewers, he is worth taking for ENGL 1101.

Prof. Martin Is the best professsor I took. I took him 1101 and let me just tell you he is one of the most caring, respectful person I ever seen. What else is that he wanted a class a STRESS FREE and he did. Take his class if your not comfortable at talking because he make his class so STREE FREE, OPTITIONAL TO SPEAK, AND MAKE DUE DATES EXTENDED
Prof. Martin is a very good teacher. He is a very good professor for 1102, because he cares about you being successful.  He is accessible outside of class and communicates very well.

Prof. Martin is a very good teacher. He is a very good professor to take your first college class with because he cares about you being successful.  He is accessible outside of class and communicates very well.

All you have to do to get a good grade is participate in class. We had three papers and that was the entire grade and you could go to the professor for feedback. The papers were basically a completion grade if you showed up to class and participated a little bit. Honestly one of my favorite classes to date.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Graded by few things

comment: Probably had class a total of 8 times during the semester because he cancelled. The only thing we had to complete was a single reflection essay at the end of the semester. Super easy class, but you have to show up.

Professor Martin is a great guy and great professor - he genuinely cares about you and your success, and explained things very well. Class was cancelled more often than not due to circumstances beyond his control. This skewed my experience with this class. I would not take this class again, but I would take him for another course.

My experience with second level English with him was very unique. Class was cancelled about 90% of the time (cancelled more than actual classes). All we did for class was write our research paper and an email explaining our thoughts and feelings with the class. Super down to earth guy and really sweet and caring, I wish he didn't cancel class much.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Graded by few things--Accessible outside class

comment: Mr. Martin is an amazing professor. He was very accommodating and very flexible with his assignments (I was allowed to turn in a video in place of an essay for one of my assignments) and just teaches a really fun class. Easy to talk to, easy lectures to listen to, I had a great time. I 100% recommend taking his class.

Super easy as long as you do the work and show up to class. Really understanding professor, by far my favorite English teacher. Had to write one narrative on anything that was like 800 words, one analysis about something similar to the narrative about 500 words, and one email arguing for your grade.
He is a really down to earth guy and makes up for when he misses class

Professor Martin is the best literature prof.I've taken. The course work is just material in class, not much homework, two essays that are open to creativity, and participation matters and just paying attention. I wish students would respect him more. He's more about helping people grow than him feeling as if it's a job. Would recommend him 100%.

I took this class as a full time dual enrollment student and loved it. The class moved super slowly and was not stressful like my other classes. Prof Martin was very understanding, attendance and participation is encouraged, and the way his grading is set up it makes it very hard to fail his class. If you need help he is accessible in every way.

Martin is not just a professor but he is a friend that you can go up  to for anything. He understands the feeling of what is like to be a student at this time. I wish I had him way sooner. Every thing is up to you. If you come in every day, participate, and do your assignments, I guarantee you this is not difficult weather you an export  or not.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Clear grading criteria--Amazing lectures

comment: He has a truly unique teaching environment,being understanding of student's needs(absences and flexible deadlines)while creating a comfortable class.He can tend to ramble on during class,re-stating things.He only gave 3 final assignments which didn't help to get a feel of his grading before then. It's definitely not an easy class though just unique

I wouldn't consider this class "easy." If you want an honorable grade than he'll make you work for it in your own comfortable way. You still have to do work. It would be what others disrespectfully say as "easy" if there weren't assignments. I would take this professor again. Really got more than what my money's worth with this guy.

He is a great professor who really cares about the subject. It's a very easy class, attendance isn't mandatory, the writing isn't hard, etc. It's impossible to fail and really hard to get a grade less than an A. Just prove that you're following along and paying attention to the lectures and you'll be fine. He's a great person.

Professor Martin opened my eyes to the beauty of poetry and completely reshaped my understanding of the history of art. One of the most impactful teachers I have ever had the privilege of learning from

TAKE PROFESSOR MARTIN!! I took him for comp 1101 and 1102, and have learned a lot. His class is a low stress environment and he is easy to reach via email. He is very understanding and is accommodating to students w/ disabilities. He keeps all course content organized on a Google doc and the assignments are manageable. He is a great professor!
Professor Martin really cares about his students. Only had two reflections (1000-1500) words each and a short journal reflection.

Professor Martin is an angel fallen from heaven. This professor has such a nice soul and such awesome ideas. Please take him if you want to enjoy a class and be stress free. I really enjoy coming to class and listening to him, his lectures are so interesting and it really has changed my view towards life. REALLY AWESOME professor, just take him!!

Professor Martin is fantastic! Hes the easiest grader in the world and doesnt require attendance, even if you dont show up all year, he still is willing to help. Hes super cool, chill, and relates to the students. The class consists of writing 2 essays, and a summary. As long as you follow the easy guidelines, youll ace the class easily.

He is the definition of a great professor. He is super laidback in the best way possible. He gives you flexibility to do your assignments (10 Journals/3 Essays) with soft-deadlines. He is also very open to all kind of writing creativity. He wants the best for not only your grades but your mental health. Definitely recommend this class :)
Prof Martin is a very nice guy. He's very committed to helping his students pass. There's only like 2 papers to write and some journal entries. As long as you do good on the papers you should pass.

Professor Christopher Martin is seriously the best teacher and person I have met in a while. He cares SO much about his students, he is actually so willing to help you succeed. He has "soft due dates" meaning he does not really have due dates, he works with you. Cool guy TAKE HIS CLASS!!!!

Easiest class I've ever taken! Professor Martin truly cares about his students well being before their grades. He is very flexible and understanding. As for the course I took, the assignments had "soft deadlines" meaning you can still turn them in weeks after they're due. He will work with you and do whatever he can to make sure you succeed.

TAKE HIM!! Not only does he truly care about his students but he also cares about making you become a better person. His class truly made me think about what it means to be human (through connection of literature) in a way that I had never thought of before. I took him two years ago and I still think about his lectures/class. Best prof I've had!

I took his online class during the summer, easiest class Ive ever taken. He is always an email away, he cares about his students, and he makes sure to send emails every week with the assignments you should be doing so you dont fall behind. Overall a very caring teacher. I did all of his assignments the week before the deadline and got an A.

I have taken professor Martin for ENGL 1101 & 1102 and World Lit. He is by far the best professor I have ever had. He is a genuine person and will reach of his students on a personal level. There is so much to learn from him. It would be in your very best interest to take his class/classes.

Prof. Martin only had one official due date, so if you procrastinate you might want to get a calendar to stay on track. He would email you every week to make sure youre on track and provide feedback for the units. His grading is easy as long as you write according to his requirements. Everything needed is in a google doc and assessable.

Professor Martin is AWESOME! He is super relaxed about the assignments, gives us plenty of time to complete them, and does not take late grades. There was also only about two or three the entire semester and they were super easy. I recommend him if you need an easier class on your schedule but please do not take advantage of his patience!

This is my second time taking Professor Martin, he's the best! Take him, you won't regret it. You have to work for your grade he is not just going to hand it to you, but he will work with you. Back when we were in person discussion in class is a big part of the class dynamic.

I've had a professor Martin for ENLG 1101, 1102, and 2110. All the classes were very interesting and easy. It is mostly participation grade if you attend class and follow all the directions. The courses are very organized and clear. The lectures are engaging. Professor Martin respects the students and cares about them. Take his classes!

If you can, TAKE HIM! He is extremely considerate and gives you until the end of the semester for work. Best prof I've ever taken. Very little work. Willing to adjust. Makes it so easy to get an A. Very easy assignments. If you don't get an A, you're trying to fail.
Great professor and gives great feedback when requested. He truly cares about his students and their grade. I will definitely take him again.
Easy asf I managed to complete all my work for him in a week SO EASY the only thing I wasnt the biggest fan of was he doesnt really use d2l but other than that crazy easy class

Prof Martin truly cares about his students and their well being, along with the importance of learning and taking something from his class. He only assigns 3 papers the entire semester along with weekly journal assignments that help you towards completing your essays. Not a difficult class, he will help you out without hesitation. Amazing guy (:

Took him Fall 2020 and loved him! If you just show up and listen to the conversations in class you will be all good! He is very respectful and understanding of his students. It seems like there are a lot of books to read in the beginning but they are all poetry books so you can read the whole book in under an hour!

A genuinely great and caring guy. Just an absolute sweetheart. There is absolutely no way to do poorly in his class unless you refuse to do certain things. He basically just gives you an A for trying on anything you turn in. Good course material and low effort. I was always worried I had something due because nothing was ever due. Highly recommend.

This teacher is amazing! He is very lenient and understanding. There are 2 major essays that are done throughout the semester. We had a lot of discussions and the class was a safe zone so we could tell our struggles and opinions on certain topics easily. I really enjoyed the class.

10/10, best professor ever! He takes the time to know every student. Lectures are content heavy and participation maters but he makes it fun to go to class. His grading style is very unique and different. He accommodates his syllabus to the students needs as well. Additionally, he is a very caring professor and very respected.

Professor Martin is probably the best english teacher at KSU. Loved his 1101 class and I regret not taking him for 1102. Class is straightforward and easy. He's also very kind and respects his students. If you can, take him.

His class isn't even hard. It is based off of a journal, unit reflections and a course project. You have to read books and coming to class you will be able to gain a better understanding of the text. He explains very well even though some if the lecture be lengthy. He is easy to contact. He values creativity and gives a new perspective. 10/10 !
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Skip class? You won't pass.--Clear grading criteria

comment: Professor Martin was the best, I wish I had him for 1102 but his classes fill up so fast. No tests/quizzes, only a course portfolio due at the end of the semester. Great guy and great feedback, really gives his students creative freedom with the portfolio.

I don't believe that perfection exist or that anyone is perfect, but I know that Christopher Martin is as perfect as one can be. He makes you want to do better and be better. You won't find a better person or professor.

I've never rated a professor in my whole college career, but I couldn't help but rate Professor Martin. Literally the best professor, and I took him for Engl1101. He is very clear on how to attain an A in the class, so just follow the plan if you want an A in the class. A GPA booster class. I'm a bio major so I wanted to take a lightweight class.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class--Graded by few things

comment: By far the best professor I've ever had. I was really struggling in other classes and his class really helped me. Only 3 papers but it's not like you have to do a ton of work and he helps you through it by setting up a meeting for extra credit. He really cares about his class and everyone in it. The topics are really good to talk about in life.
One of the absolute best professors I have ever had. He really does care about you and wants to see you succeed.

The best professor ever. He is the one most caring people I have ever met in my entire life. He understands certain circumstances, and puts thinking and learning in front of grades. Lots of in class conversations and talking over topics.
Best professor ever. So caring and so understanding. He doesnt give a lot of work but the work he does give is meaningful, not busy work. TAKE HIM!!!!!
Professor Martin is an amazing teacher, person and role model. He is easy to talk too and is understanding. I highly recommend taking his class.

Prof. Martin is always open for discussion and wants to see your perspective on things. He is very caring, and adjusts due dates as needed. He doesn't really use D2L, but he uses a different platform, Schoology.
This guy was really cool and understanding! I turned in a few projects late and still received a good great. If you're honest with him, he'll be more than willing to help you out.
Best professor I had all semester. He is extremely open-minded and cares about his students. Loves to talk in class so if you are more introverted, its not for you. I would recommend him to anyone!

Nice guy and cares for his students. Hes also very understanding and sympathetic to his students dispositions. Work is pretty straightforward and grading is not harsh at all. If youre looking for a challenging course, then hes not the professor for you, but if not, them take him!
Great teacher, very easy class. He does tend to get off topic during class, but he is straight forward with his assignments.
He is a good guy, and the class is not very difficult.
Unimaginable care for his students. Very reasonable on assignments and easy on grading. Best prof ever!!

Nice prof, cares about all students in the class, interested in genuine learning. Focuses on creating/responding to "arguments" and thinking about things like rhetoric. Heard these things in other classes but nice to get to actually apply them to real world conversations. Class not easy but not a burden

Professor Martin is truly a great guy. I had him for 1101 and now 1102. He really really cares about his students and will work with you if need be. He enjoys class conversation and I personally appreciate that. He gives plenty of time for due dates. There's really no reason to not get an A, unless you just simply don't do basic work. Take him.

He has a great perspective towards teaching & composition. He encourages students to think for themselves & question things they've been told throughout their lives! Truly an amazing guy & teacher. Don't take him if you want a boring "here is where you place a comma in a sentence" type of class. He teaches more important, much deeper material.

Really cares about his students and knows how stressful it can be for honors students. His class is not one to worry about. He is very understanding and pushes back due dates if you need extra time. Class conversations are interesting. I would definitely take his class again.

his class is super easy and you learn a bunch for your writing. He likes to have conversations during class, and that really sets him apart from other professors. I felt like it was a little too easy tho.
This was the nicest, most aware proffessor I've ever had. 10/10. I recommend him to all students, no matter what the major.

He's literally amazing. Not only one of my favorite teachers, but he's such a great person too. I'm such a math/ science person so I was pretty nervous going into this class, but with Professor Martin, there's nothing to worry about!! I 100% recommend him!!!

Professor Martin is easily one of the best professors at Kennesaw. Seriously, show up, do the online discussions, and write 3 papers. That's it. That's all there is. It is impossible to fail. I struggled very much on the compositions, yet he helped me, saw effort and gave me constructive criticism. A great family guy. Taking him again for 1102.

Professor Martin is a super nice teacher and he makes sure that everyone is following along. As long as you keep up with the online assignments and turn in your compositions on time you'll be fine. Also I had the hybrid course so we only met once a week and attendance was a part of the grade so it's not bad at all.

Very knowledgeable in the subject area and is an author Offers a lot of extra credit(offered some to me before the class had even started by emailing him about how my summer was) Very easy grader for papers and online discussions Great at keeping students in the loop (through schoology updates and groupme). I'd definitely recommend him!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--EXTRA CREDIT--Would take again

comment: Professor Martin is just amazing. A caring guy who should have more confidence in his ability as a teacher because he is a great one. Show up, participate, and give effort and you'll get an excellent grade in the class. He gives you the freedom to write about a broad range of topics and is open to any new ideas and feedback. All around awesome.

Great Professor if you are not the best write like me. He disnt guve the most feedback on papers. He is very nice and shows he is caring now if he just showed more confidence i think he can be better he doubts his ability as a teacher and i think he dies well at it. Plenty of class disscusions. Very liberal just a note but dosnt force his opini

He's seriously the best professor. He loves his students and wants them to be involved in both the class & community. As long as you do what you're asked to do without half-assing it, you'll make an A.
He is a great professor! It is obvious that he wants the best for all his students and wants you to succeed!!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Participation matters--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS

comment: I enjoyed this class. Prof Martin is so caring and genuinely cares about your education. The class isn't difficult at all. If you show up and do the work, it is an easy A. He is very approachable and class discussions are on current issues so they are engaging and fun. There are only 2-3 essays and no tests. Your final is basically a reflection.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: Great professor who actually cares for his students! I struggled with a paper so I emailed him. We met and he directed me on how to do my paper. So helpful and friendly.
rating_tags: ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: He tries to be nice and helpful, but it often comes across as him trying to compensate for the lack of teaching and guidance he gives during class. I enjoyed class discussions, which were thoughtful, but this is a composition course and I don't feel like my writing improved at all.
He is a very nicce guy. If you have any problems he is approachable. Definitely recommend him. Show up, participate and at least try on your assignments and you will be fine.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: He's an awesome professor so far. You can tell he's family oriented and cares about his students.

I'd wish Mr. Martin taught more than 1101. He cares about his students very much and the feedback you will receive on your essays will reflect how much he is devoted to your success. He's caring and sensitive, and will make the effort to help you in any situation outside the classroom. Hearing from him after the course was over made my week.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--GRADED BY FEW THINGS--Caring

comment: He's a wonderful professor, genuinely cares about his students.. wants to see everyone pass. only 3 essays with the first 2 being incorporated together as the final. (no tests) as well as weekly discussion posts. He seems to kind  of lacks confidence in his teaching ability although he's a wonderful teacher. I would take again. Great class!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Get ready to read--Caring

comment: He is by far the best English professor I have ever had. He hates the terms grades and would rather you take something from his class. He makes you understand everything. As long as you do the work you will pass, and if your failing he trys to help you out. If you can definitely take him!!!! I took his hybrid class and loved it and him!!!!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: Took his hybrid class for Comp 2. Very easy minimal work (about an hour a week) for reading assignments and very few essays. Nice guy, gave good feedback and would highly recommend him for anyone taking a comp class.

It was a little intimidating having a new professor but he was really nice and caring. Inserts current events into discussion, a really good professor to have. You'll write a few papers (maybe 4?) and he'll grade them and give you feedback. Your final will be a portfolio of your final drafts of the papers. Nice class, would take again.
Very easy going and lenient professor. No tests, not a whole lot of essays either. 10/10
